ygData.subject: Re: Sean.Clark@UCHSC.edu
ygData.msgSnippet: What this asshole doing on the list? Well, I warned this person to stop emailing me.  As per my lawyers request I had warned him before not to email me or a
ygData.messageBody:
What this asshole doing on the list?



Well, I warned this person to stop emailing me. As per my lawyers request I had warned him before not to email me or a proof reading fee would be exempted to
his university/his parents. He sent me an email this morning that was lengthy and I didn't even bother reading it. Again (to the people of the list), do not send me
private emails. Mr. Clark is going to have to go to small claims court because of his actions.
